comments.body:
Do we need to expose the Civet classes? Ideally:
- they are only included by *source* files
- even their headers can move to net/http/src/
- they don't need to have dictionaries generated for them (i.e. can be removed from Linkdef.h)
Please consider this for a subsequent PR!

Yes, I place here generic code, which can be used to plug any other http engines from external libraries. But for civetweb and fastcgi one can directly use constructors. I will implement it in following PR.
